name: 楊世任
objective:
一、線性連立方程式
二、矩陣基本運算
三、行列式
四、向量空間與基底
五、線性相依與線性獨立
六、線性轉換
七、正交空間
八、特徵值與特徵向量
schedule:
週次	時數	授課內容
1	3	課程概述、評分方式、進度概述、Systems of Linear Equations (2hrs)
2	3	Systems of Linear Equations (1hrs)、Matrix Operations (2hrs)
3	3	Matrix Operations(2hrs) 、Determinants (1hrs)
4	3	Determinants (3hrs)
5	3	Determinants (2hrs) 、Vector Spaces (1hrs)
6	3	Vector Spaces (3hrs)
7	3	Vector Spaces (3hrs)
8	3	Vector Spaces (3hrs)
9	3	Midterm Exam (3hrs)
10	3	Inner Product Spaces (3hrs)
11	3	Inner Product Spaces (3hrs)
12	3	Inner Product Spaces (2hrs)、 Linear Transformations (1hrs)
13	3	Linear Transformations (3hrs)
14	3	Linear Transformations (3hrs)
15	3	Linear Transformations (1hrs)、Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (2hrs)
16	3	Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (3hrs)
17	3	Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors (3hrs)
18	3	Final exam. (3hrs)
scorePolicy:
期中考佔30%，
期末考佔30%，
隨堂考試、演算習作、及課堂表現佔40%
materials: 教科書:	Linear Algebra, 6th edition, by R. Larson, and D. C. Falvo, Houghton Mifflin Company, 2004，高立圖書代理。
